root.title: addit ccc credit guarante for hungari
root.body: the commod credit corpor ccc author addit 8.0 mln dlr credit guarante sale veget protein meal hungari fiscal year 1987 u. agricultur depart say the addit guarante increas veget protein meal credit line 16.0 mln dlr increas cumul fiscal year 1987 program agricultur product 23.0 mln dlr 15.0 mln say the depart also announc extens export period septemb 30 1987 decemb 31 sale veget protein meal To elig credit guarante sale must regist export later septemb 30
